name: Lit Quest
description:
Lits Quest is a game about a young candle passing his flame to others, before his flame rans out...

Light things, melt things, push other things and most importantly keep the flame alive!

Controls:  

Movement: W,A,S,D |  Light Up: Space bar

The Team:

Abdulrahman from @TableKnightGames - Programming & Level Design

Ghadeer from @TableKnightGames - Art

Felwah  @FellForGames - Art

This game was created during the "Game Zanga 10"
